org.pepstock.charba.client.events

Interface ChartEventHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.google.gwt.event.shared.EventHandler
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AnimationCompleteEventHandler, AnimationProgressEventHandler, ChartClickEventHandler, ChartHoverEventHandler, ChartResizeEventHandler, DatasetSelectionEventHandler, LegendClickEventHandler, LegendHoverEventHandler

    public interface ChartEventHandler
extends com.google.gwt.event.shared.EventHandler
    Common interface for all chart event handlers, used to recognize when the chart event handlers (and only the chart ones) have been activated.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
